subject: Partnership Purple Sector x Simsonn
description_text:
Dear SimSonn Team

I’m Sadin, team lead of Purple Sector (Switzerland). We compete in Gran
Turismo 7 and Le Mans Ultimate (soon more Simulators). We’re a small but
ambitious team with a good reputation in our leagues, and we really like
your brand and braking solutions.


We’d love to explore a starter partnership:


   -

   Preferred: support toward a brake setup we can run on our main rigs and
   feature in racing content.
   -

   If that’s too much right now: a simple affiliate/discount arrangement
   also works.

In return:


   -

   Logo placement on our livery and team assets
   -

   Consistent tags/mentions and posts on our social media
   (TikTok/Instagram/X) with regular race highlights/POVs
   -

   Short setup notes & honest long-term feedback you can reference
   -

   Promotion in the leagues we race (where permitted) and within our team
   channels (Discord/internal)

We’re genuinely giving it our best and focused on growing partnering with
us means investing in a small team on its way up.

If the timing isn’t right, no worries—we appreciate your time and hope to
run your gear soon.


Best regards,

Sadin Konuk

Team Lead — Purple Sector

Switzerland

conversations.body_text: Dear Sadin,  Thank you very much for reaching out and for your interest in Simsonn — we truly appreciate your kind words about our products and your enthusiasm for sim racing. It’s great to hear about Purple Sector and your growing presence in the community.  We’d be happy to collaborate with you. If you’d like to equip your team with our gear, we can offer you an exclusive 30% discount on your order.  Additionally, you’re welcome to join our Affiliate Program, where you can earn commission for every successful referral or sale generated through your unique link: ? https://www.simsonn.com/pages/affiliate-program  We look forward to seeing Purple Sector continue to grow and would be glad to support your journey in the sim racing world.  Best regards, The Simsonn Team

Hi SimSonn Team,

thank you for the generous offer — we’re happy to collaborate.

We’d like to accept the 30% discount for our team and join the affiliate
program.

To make this practical for us: our drivers are spread worldwide and pay
individually. Could you issue a team code (e.g., PURPLESECTOR30) that each
driver can use for their own checkout within a short window (e.g., 30
days)? Since our drivers self-finance, we can’t guarantee how many will
order in that window, but we will actively push the affiliate link and the
discount across our channels.

A few quick points to confirm:


   -

   Non-exclusive: we may work with other brands in parallel — is that fine?
   -

   Brand usage: may we place your logo on our livery and use it on
   socials/Discord to promote the partnership? If yes, please share a logo
   pack/brand guidelines.
   -

   Logistics: any product exclusions or limits for the code? Shipping to
   Switzerland/EU/US, VAT/customs handling, typical lead times?
   -

   Warranty/returns: coverage and RMA process?
   -

   Affiliate: commission %, cookie window, payout method/threshold.

Thanks again — excited to run SimSonn on our rigs and grow together.


Best regards,

Sadin Konuk

Team Lead — Purplesector
